Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 97.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy Production and Regulation

official_title: A bill to provide for a limited exemption to the hydroelectric licensing provisions of part I of the Federal Power Act for certain transmission facilities associated with the El Vado Hydroelectric Project in New Mexico.

summary.text: Exempts certain transmission line facilities associated with the El Vado Hydroelectric Project in New Mexico from the hydroelectric licensing provisions of part I of the Federal Power Act and from the jurisdiction of the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission.

titles.title: A bill to provide for a limited exemption to the hydroelectric licensing provisions of part I of the Federal Power Act for certain transmission facilities associated with the El Vado Hydroelectric Project in New Mexico.
